Name: Get node XPath
Description: Can I get the xpath of a node in the DOM tree?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. Inspect the element > Right click on the node in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy full XPath

Firefox.Notes: 1. Inspect element > Right click on the node in the DOM tree > Copy > XPath

Edge.Notes: 1. Inspect element > Right click on the node in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy full XPath

Safari.Notes: 1. Inspect element > Right click on the node in the DOM tree > Copy > XPath.

Opera.Notes: 1. Inspect the element > Right click on the node in the DOM tree > Copy > Copy full XPath
